long_description: Scott Sportster 30 bike uses a hybrid design ensure comfort while cruising around town or casually exploring the area, and it sweetens the deal with Shimano parts and a front, shock-absorbent fork. Aluminum frame is light and sturdy enough to tackle rough urban streets or pleasant rides in the countryside. Flat handlebar creates a comfortable, upright riding position that enables heads-up visibility. SR Suntour NEX HLO suspension fork provides 63mm of travel to soften bumps and jolts; suspension can be locked out when it's not needed. Shimano triple crankset powers 27 gear choices to confidently handle almost any grade; Shimano Altus shifters deftly guide the Deore derailleurs through each gear. Shimano hydraulic disc brakes deliver offer an upgrade over mechanical systems while ensuring all-weather performance. Large 700c wheels with plush, semislick tires cruise along easily for a swift, sporty ride. Specs on the Scott Sportster 30 bike are subject to change.
